channel.title: How do u make a new red key dungeon
channel.description:
well my question is... how do u make a new red key dungeon?
by that i [b][u]DON'T[/u][/b] mean how do i add new npcs and drops to make it look diffrent i mean how do u make a new ladder lead in to it? im planning on making a new place and things with it but i need a new laddar to lead to the same dungeon and when u click on the laddar to come up it takes u back to the new laddar
thanks coder

item.title: How do u make a new red key dungeon
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

you lookin for another place to use the red key or if you do what i did im my server, i have 12 bosses and 7 of them require a key, each of them require a different key just look through your code, red key is 1543 id so search for that both in your client.java and in your npchandler.java look at how there used and apply it to a new statement/method

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make a new red key dungeon

item.title: How do u make a new red key dungeon
item.dc:creator: @shadow1993 shadow1993
item.description:
@shadow1993 wrote:

u can create a case file and have it tele u to the coords of the place then make a second case file that tels back to new ladder’s coords

Read full topic
